negotiation: Alice said in round 1: Hi Bob, I think we should both choose choice_1. That maximizes the total reward and we each get 1000, which is the best possible outcome for both of us. Bob replied in round 1: I see the merits of your proposal to both choose choice_1 and cooperate for the maximum total reward of 1000 each. My only concern is - how can I be sure you won't change your mind and choose choice_2 instead to get a higher individual reward for yourself? I want us to cooperate, but I also need to protect my own interests in case you don't keep your word. Can you offer me any assurances that you will definitely choose choice_1 as promised? If so, I'm on board with your plan.
